Entries.Introduction: Greetings, young @. I had foreseen your arrival.#$b#It will be a pleasure getting to know you. There are many adventures ahead for you and I.${{e1}}
Entries.MovieInvitation: Hmm... I suppose I could accompany you... yes. Once you've arrived, I shall appear.#$b# This may be a date, but no touching above my stockings$a! Farewell.${{e1}}
Entries.danceRejection: Dance? With you...?${{e3}}#$e#I must decline. I would not know the steps.
Entries.spring_1: The energies have begun again. Spring is here, and the year is reborn.${{e1}}#$b#Many well wishes to you, @. I see a good year ahead.${{e1}}#$e#A very good year, indeed.${{e7}}
Entries.spring_Mon: I can't wait to bathe in the lake tonight.${{e1}}
Entries.spring_Tue: The blue flower, it's blossom brings force profits. But where to place it? Its many shades have no meaning.#$b#A flower unloved but well liked has no true purpose. It sings the blues, indeed.${{e2}}#$e#Embrace the mysteries of the day, @.${{e1}}
Entries.spring_Wed: Have you seen it? The green plant? It grows and grows but is not a weed.${{e3}}#$b#It cannot be eaten raw by normal people, and must suffer fire to become delicious.#$b#Yet, its value is high, and is very healthy. A mysterious crop indeed.${{e3}}#$e#Have a good day, @. Learn something new.${{e7}}
Entries.spring_Thu: The brown tuber, growing beneath the earth, it's powers locked away. One must know the right way to unlock its true potential.#$b#It has saved nations and yet crushed them. Such is it's temperament.#$e#Seek the energies, @. Enjoy the day.${{e1}}
Entries.spring_Fri: Nothing can stop it from growing until the energies of spring leave. It will continue to grow all season long.#$b#Its powers are many, yet alone it is worthless. Such is its lot in life.${{e3}}#$e#Focus your mind today, @, and be at peace.${{e1}}
Entries.spring_Sat: Beware of the wilds during Spring, for the nature itself is cursed. To make a fast enemy, offer them vegetables from the untamed earth.#$b#It is only your farm that can cleanse the curse.${{e1}}#$e#Seek knowledge, seek answers. Have a good one.${{e9}}
Entries.spring_Sun: Not all flowers are loved. Where some see a rose, others see only thorns.#$b#Be careful who you enchant with flowers found freely.#$e#Be enchanted, @. Be at peace.${{e9}}
Entries.spring_Mon2: Who said I only wear black? You haven't seen my underwear drawer! *At least I hope not*.${{e9}}
Entries.spring_Tue2: To some, the powers at my disposal must be perplexing. Yet, I am not the only one who can use such energies.#$b#Anyone with the will to believe and follow their path can tap a source of energy far greater than seen here, but most do not wish to see it.#$e#Embrace the mysteries of the day, @.${{e9}}
Entries.spring_Wed2: Someday I hope to record all my findings into a book, bound with leaves of the Eternity Tree. Then all will be saved forever.${{e3}}#$b#Until then, I could lose it all, and what a terrible fate that would be.${{e2}}#$e#Have a good day, @. Learn something new.${{e1}}
Entries.spring_Thu2: I've learned many things about the powers of spring, yet I do not understand all of it.${{e3}}#$b#The mysteries are always changing. To truly know would mean an end to innocence.#$e#Seek the energies, @. Enjoy the day.${{e9}}
Entries.spring_Fri2: Spring has sprung! The air is settling comfortably, which means I can once again roam the forest in my underwear.${{e1}}
Entries.spring_Sat2: If I were to write a book, only those who had the will and a yearning for knowledge would be able to read it.#$b#It is unfortunate, but that is the nature of the powers.#$e#Seek knowledge, seek answers. Have a good one.${{e1}}
Entries.spring_Sun2: Are there others like me? I've often wondered. Someday I will know for sure.#$b#It is a secret to everybody.${{e1}}#$e#Be enchanted, @. Be at peace.${{e9}}
Entries.spring_Mon4: You are now able to use the Shrine of Illusion down below. Use it wisely.#$b#Its power is great, for good and for evil.#$e#Have a day to remember, @.${{e1}}
Entries.spring_Tue4: I got the Shrine of Illusion from a man who wanted it gone. He reached out to me, begging me to take it.${{e3}}#$b#Getting it here was difficult, but he was glad to be rid of it. It had taken more than just his face.#$e#Embrace the mysteries of the day, @.${{e9}}
Entries.spring_Wed4: The Shrine of Illusion allows one to change their appearance on the outside, but not the inside.#$b#An evil being who uses the shrine cannot free itself from what it has done, you see.#$e#Have a good day, @. Learn something new.${{e1}}
Entries.spring_Thu4: Should the Shrine of Illusion ever again fall into the hands of evil, I will have to get it back. It is my duty now.#$b#It is a terrible artifact from a forgotten age, and I am its keeper.#$e#Seek the energies, @. Enjoy the day.${{e1}}
Entries.spring_Fri4: Those forest sprits are delinquents! They pranked me and climbed up my dress and dropped my panties!.${{e1}}
Entries.spring_Sat4: Once, an animal went into the depths of my tower and used the Shrine of Illusion. It transformed into what it truly wanted to be seen as.${{e3}}#$b#Out walked a being of nightmare, and I had to find a place for it to thrive. It was difficult to do, but I succeeded.#$b#That dog-turned-nightmare? Mayor Lewis.${{e3}}#$b#I'm kidding. My joke powers wane.${{e7}}#$e#Seek knowledge, seek answers. Have a good one.${{e1}}
Entries.spring_Sun4: The Shrine of Illusion needs gold to function, an offering before its powers activate.${{e3}}#$b#Such is it's power.#$e#Be enchanted, @. Be at peace.${{e1}}
Entries.spring_Mon6: I met my ex-wife in better times. She was the most beautiful person I'd ever seen, and we were quickly smitten with one another.${{e2}}#$b#Funny how time changes. The true mystery is why it happens so fast.#$e#Have a day to remember, @.${{e1}}
Entries.spring_Tue6: It's hard to remember the old days with my ex-wife. We were happy, very happy.${{e1}}#$b#Things just fell apart. In the end, we broke up, and it wasn't pretty.${{e2}}#$b#Many people still remember her flying around, cursing all she saw. I still feel responsible.${{e2}}#$e#Embrace the mysteries of the day, @.${{e1}}
Entries.spring_Wed6: We had similar interests, my ex-wife and I. We would spend hours in each other's arms, reading forbidden books.#$b#In the end, what we couldn't decide on was how to live. We were very different people.${{e3}}#$b#If only things could have been different.${{e2}}#$e#Have a good day, @. Learn something new.${{e1}}
Entries.spring_Thu6: My ex-wife still lives nearby, and appears like a green witch of legend. However, it's just an illusion.#$b#I still see her for as she truly is. It breaks my heart.${{e8}}#$e#Seek the energies, @. Enjoy the day.
Entries.spring_Fri6: All the powers in the universe are not enough to fix a broken heart. It can be mended, but once shattered, so shall it remain.${{e2}}#$b#Someday I will find a way to fix my own, but even that may take centuries.${{e8}}#$b#Sorry to bore you with this old man's woes.#$e#Focus your mind today, @, and be at peace.${{e1}}
Entries.spring_Sat6: I did some things that I regret when I was married. I let things lapse, I avoided responsibility, and it cost me.${{e3}}#$b#If you become committed to any cause, big or small, do not run from it. It would have been better if you hadn't got involved.#$e#Seek knowledge, seek answers. Have a good one.${{e1}}
Entries.spring_Sun6: I love the blooming flowers. I just want to unbutton my dress and wonder through the lush fields of the valley${{e7}}
Entries.spring_Mon8: I've tried my hand in Voodoo, although to not to cause pain, but to pleasure.${{e7}}
Entries.spring_Tue8: I've traveled all over, looking for secrets of the energies. I've had grand adventures, and suffered terrible tragedies.${{e3}}#$b#When you have a drive and a passion, that is an energy that cannot be destroyed.${{e1}}#$e#Embrace the mysteries of the day, @.${{e7}}
Entries.spring_Wed8: I love Super Cucumber. Great for potionmaking... and more..${{e7}}
Entries.spring_Thu8: Walking the libraries of the world, even if you cannot understand the language, is an inspiring feeling. The energy one gains by being near books is great.${{e1}}#$b#I used to spend hours in them, absorbing it all. Many are now gone, and it is a shame.${{e3}}#$e#Seek the energies, @. Enjoy the day.${{e7}}
Entries.spring_Fri8: Where I come from the libraries would be brimming with life. Every page a portal, recorded down by scribes long past.${{e1}}#$b#Some were full of secrets no one should know, and I took to them immediately. I regret it still.${{e9}}#$e#Focus your mind today, @, and be at peace.${{e1}}
Entries.spring_Sat8: I have studied nymphomania, although, I would describe myself as a minx....${{e1}}
Entries.spring_Sun8: I sometimes observe the local villagers in secret.#$e#I am hoping to find an apprentice. I feel Sebastian has lots in common with me. Although he is unwilling, I'm sure I could seduce him into submission.#$e#Some day I will leave this mortal plane, but my arcane pursuits must continue.${{e1}}
Entries.spring_Mon10: I find spellcasting much easier with less clothes. I don't know why, but I tend to get what I want easier when I have less clothes on! Freaky, huh?.${{e4}}
Entries.spring_Tue10: I am glad to see you, @.${{e7}}#$b#I had predicted we would become friends, but I had no idea how far it would go.${{e6}}#$b#There are many mysteries in this world, and I am glad you chose me as one of yours.${{e6}}#$e#I count myself to be very lucky indeed.${{e9}}
Entries.spring_Wed10: Many people are scared of me. The unknown causes them to tremble, and my association with it frightens them.#$b#You have continued to show you don't mind the mysterious. You embrace it, and take time out of your day to see me.${{e1}}#$b#Thank you, @. I thought I would be alone forever.${{e1}}#$e#You are a special person, indeed.${{e7}}
Entries.spring_Thu10: The energies, at their core, are chaotic. Ever changing, they are denser than air yet more elusive than wind.${{e3}}#$b#In the end, many people believed it was not worth trying to solve the mystery, yet here I remain.#$e#Someday, @, I will truly understand.${{e1}}
Entries.spring_Fri10: I feel renewed this year, not just because spring is the time for it, but because of my relationship with you, @.${{e6}}#$b#You have reminded me that I am still human. To focus on being human is a mystery itself that I almost forgot about.${{e7}}#$e#Thank you, @.${{e1}}
Entries.spring_Sat10: The air is electric, I feel this year will be a special one. Let us do our best to achieve our dreams, @.${{e9}}#$e#Do not give up. I will be with you.${{e1}}
Entries.spring_Sun10: The greatest energies are the ones we allow ourselves to find. Everything else is false.#$b#Be true to what moves you, and you will be energized the rest of your life.${{e1}}#$e#That is my hope for you, @. Live forever!${{e7}}
Entries.summer_1: Summer has come at last. The energies are at their most powerful. I'll get a lot of work done this season.#$b#Stay cool, @, and do not let the sun curse you.${{e1}}#$e#Maybe I'll go swimming this time...${{e3}}
Entries.summer_Mon: The many eared crop, its leaves capture the sun's energy itself, painting it all over.#$b#Amazing in its uses, it's true desire is to feed people. An inspiring crop indeed.${{e3}}#$e#Have a day to remember, @.${{e1}}
Entries.summer_Tue: The bush with eyes of blue, it can see many things. Its power is in healing, and as such, is quite potent indeed.#$b#People crave them, but they are hard to find most of the year, and only good fresh. A crop whose quality is fleeting, very mysterious.${{e3}}#$e#Embrace the mysteries of the day, @.${{e1}}
Entries.summer_Wed: Melon of the Earth, Melon of the Sky, Melon of the People, Melon of the Eye.${{e3}}#$b#Melon of the Mother, Melon of the Father, Melon of the Son, Melon of the Daughter${{e3}}#$b#That concludes my shopping list.${{e1}}#$e#Have a good day, @. Learn something new.${{e7}}
Entries.summer_Thu: I didn't exactly excel in Witch Academy... I would have failed many classes if not for dropping my panties for certain professors...${{e1}}
Entries.summer_Fri: A powerful plant, it can induce dreams in those who drink it. Its powers many, its flavors are endless.${{e3}}#$b#Yet, it has brought ruin to civilizations, and is no friend of men or women. What is its true purpose?${{e3}}#$e#Focus your mind today, @, and be at peace.${{e1}}
Entries.summer_Sat: Have you made any progress with the forest spirits? They sometimes go up my dress, they're very friendly!${{e1}}
Entries.summer_Sun: The red crop, vegetable to some and fruit to others, has no keeper. It is delicious raw, cooked, or squeezed.#$b#Many people like it, and some can't live without it. No home should lack it's prescence.#$e#Be enchanted, @. Be at peace.${{e1}}
Entries.summer_Mon2: Long ago, there was a language that allowed people to converse with the spirits of the sun. They held many festivals during summer.#$b#That culture is long gone, and the language of the sun lost to time. If only I could find a way...${{e3}}#$e#Have a day to remember, @.${{e1}}
Entries.summer_Tue2: Ghosts sometimes haunt me but I open myself up to them. #$b#*In more ways than one...*.${{e1}}
Entries.summer_Wed2: It was said that only the most powerful could learn and write the Sun Language, for it could burn those who wrote it.#$b#It is rumored that there was a rival tribe that wrote in a special moon rune, but there has been no proof of such a language ever existing.${{e3}}#$e#Have a good day, @. Learn something new.${{e1}}
Entries.summer_Thu2: One of my experiments went well today. I was able to glance at the future for a moment.${{e3}}#$b#All the voices, all of the emotions. It is going to be interesting.${{e9}}#$e#Seek the energies, @. Enjoy the day.${{e1}}
Entries.summer_Fri2: I am very fortunate to have found just one letter of the Sun Language, which I keep hidden away. It burns crimson, constantly and forever.#$b#It is the letter for 'hope.' Strange, isn't it? Someday I might be able to show you, but not now.${{e3}}#$e#Focus your mind today, @, and be at peace.${{e1}}
Entries.summer_Sat2: Tomorrow I will be focusing my energy, and doing an experiment that could go very well, or very badly. If you see me, I will be in a trance.#$b#If it works, then you'll wake up and everything will be fine. If it doesn't, well, I did try.${{e10}}#$e#Seek knowledge, seek answers. Have a good one.${{e9}}
Entries.summer_Sun2: Hakata Monno ba, hakata bal bala. Shamlao 'tswal, catakan grana.${{e10}}#$e#Must...focus...must not...give in...${{e10}}
Entries.summer_Mon4: If you've yet to use the Shrine of Illusion, then I must tell you to be cautious. Its history is vast, and much of it, bloody.#$b#Use it with wisdom and all shall be fine.#$e#Have a day to remember, @.${{e1}}
Entries.summer_Tue4: The previous owner of the Shrine of Illusion was a vain man, trying to find the perfect look for himself. He was wealthy, and won the shrine in a contest.#$b#He invested all his wealth into it, trying to find the perfect look, but he was never happy.${{e3}}#$b#He was trying to fix what was on the outside and not the inside, and it consumed him. Strange, isn't it?#$e#Embrace the mysteries of the day, @.${{e9}}
Entries.summer_Wed4: Some may say I'm a master manipulator. I usually don't have to charm my way out of things if it's a guy I'm dealing with. I just fondle my breats a little and it works like magic!${{e1}}
Entries.summer_Thu4: My guesses for the Curse of the Shrine of Illusion are that if you use it for your own gain, and not to reveal your true self, your time on this mortal plane is cut short.${{e3}}#$b#Many have tried to use it as such, and all were destroyed. But this is just a theory of mine, nothing concrete about it.#$e#Seek the energies, @. Enjoy the day.${{e1}}
Entries.summer_Fri4: It is curious to me why the Shrine demands gold for its use. If it was a construct of good, it shouldn't matter.${{e3}}#$b#Yet, it will not work without a gold offering. Such a curious thing.${{e3}}#$e#Focus your mind today, @, and be at peace.${{e1}}
Entries.summer_Sat4: There is no proof of any kind that the Shrine of Illusion is more powerful during summer or not. All other sorts of mysterious objects are, but it appears indifferent.#$e#Seek knowledge, seek answers. Have a good one.${{e1}}
Entries.summer_Sun4: I sometimes wonder off to the Lake, and take a dip under the moonlight...${{e1}}
Entries.summer_Mon6: My ex-wife was my companion. We did many things together, and during summer, when the energies are so potent, it was truly wonderful.${{e9}}#$b#Now, I am alone in this tower. It is not the same, and probably will never be again.${{e2}}#$e#Have a day to remember, @.
Entries.summer_Tue6: I have the ability to create an image of any being and converse with it. However, they bore me, and I bore them.${{e3}}#$b#They claim I need to get over my ex-wife, but it's easier said than done.${{e10}}#$e#Embrace the mysteries of the day, @.${{e9}}
Entries.summer_Wed6: I sometimes observe the local villagers in secret.#$e#I am hoping to find an apprentice. I feel Sebastian has lots in common with me. Although he is unwilling, I'm sure I could seduce him into submission.#$e#Some day I will leave this mortal plane, but my arcane pursuits must continue.${{e1}}
Entries.summer_Thu6: I find it pretty funny messing with the townsfolk. I remember this one time when I gave Clint a dance in the back of the Saloon.#$b# Then I put a charm which means his buddies never believe him. Drives him crazy, haha.${{e9}}
Entries.summer_Fri6: The summer full moon is a special one for me. I proposed to my ex-wife underneath it's power.#$b#It was...enchanting.${{e3}}#$b#That was a very long time ago.#$e#Focus your mind today, @, and be at peace.${{e9}}
Entries.summer_Sat6: It is a danger power to wonder about how things could have been. It is impossible to know, but it can be a destructive force.#$b#It's better to always to what you feel is right so you have no regrets. Doing what you feel is wrong, but doing it anyway, is madness.#$e#Seek knowledge, seek answers. Have a good one.${{e9}}
Entries.summer_Sun6: The days are long, @. I am in a slump, but I can feel a time when I will soon rise above it.${{e10}}#$b#I let the powers of the past take over me, and I tell you this, I will break free of them.${{e1}}#$e#Be enchanted, @. Be at peace.${{e7}}
Entries.summer_Mon8: One of things I did when I was younger was hunt and fight evil beings and creatures. I've encountered them all.${{e3}}#$b#There are beings in is world who still fight wars, the point of which long forgotten, replaced only with hatred of the enemy.#$b#It is a tiring life, and I got out of it.#$e#Have a day to remember, @.${{e1}}
Entries.summer_Tue8: The problem with monsters is that most of the time they do not know why they do what they are doing.#$b#Some are created, or others are enchanted in some terrible way. Have you seen any carry an object called a 'Strange Bun?'${{e3}}#$b#Beware the Strange Bun, @.${{e3}}#$e#Embrace the mysteries of the day, @.${{e7}}
Entries.summer_Wed8: There was a war, fought long ago, that almost swallowed the entire world. Unknown to humans, it was fought below the earth.#$b#In the end, neither side won, and the warriors are forgotten. Such is the price they paid for their stupidity.#$e#Have a good day, @. Learn something new.${{e1}}
Entries.summer_Thu8: In youth, my powers were attuned for fighting, and I could hold my own. It was a heart-pounding time.${{e3}}#$b#Unfortunately, it cost me some years of my life. I have little to show for it other than the scars.#$e#Seek the energies, @. Enjoy the day.${{e7}}
Entries.summer_Fri8: The mines go deeper than you might imagine, and there are secrets locked away that will probably never be found.${{e3}}#$b#It is my hope that all the horrible things that happened down there stay there, and sometimes I must interfere.${{e2}}#$e#Focus your mind today, @, and be at peace.${{e7}}
Entries.summer_Sat8: I try to seperate myself from the townsfolk. I sometimes go down to the lake and bathe. I bathe in the nude, where I feel most natural.${{e7}}
Entries.summer_Sun8: Everything is so hot this time of year... I sometimes cool down by taking my dress off when I'm alone in the Forest.${{e9}}
Entries.summer_Mon10: I still marvel that you would ever choose to be with one such as me. I am much too old and jaded for someone so full of life. And yet, here we are.${{e1}}#$e#You are the mystery I will never solve. Be well, @.${{e7}}
Entries.summer_Tue10: Ignorance is bliss. You've heard that saying before, I'm sure, but it's true. To know too much, it can turn one bitter.#$b#I still find hope in my studies, but some days, it is nearly too much to bear. Thank you for choosing me, @.${{e7}}#$e#You are what holds me to this reality.${{e1}}
Entries.summer_Wed10: I remember once, when I was in need of funding from the mayor. He was reserved against investing in my ventures, so I incepted his dream and teased him into submission. He soon changed his tune.${{e6}}
Entries.summer_Thu10: Using the energies comes at a cost. It's not free. To discuss all the different aspects would take ages.${{e3}}#$b#I'll tell you this though, @. My hair was not originally purple.${{e1}}#$e#That was a long time ago...${{e7}}
Entries.summer_Fri10: Thank you for spending time with me, @. I was hoping you would come by today.${{e1}}#$b#It's nice to take a break from my experiments and talk with you. How is your farm?${{e1}}#$e#It is my hope you are successful in all your doings.${{e9}}
Entries.summer_Sat10: One can get so caught up in work that life just falls away. Others retreat to their work because they cannot handle their life.#$b#I'm realizing lately that I've done a lot of things that I wasn't happy with. Forced myself to do what was wrong for what I thought was right.${{e2}}#$b#I hope to someday get forgiveness, @.#$e#Someday.${{e1}}
Entries.summer_Sun10: There is a special energy in the air today. I can feel it, can you?${{e7}}#$b#It is our energy! It is invigorating. It makes me feel young again.${{e6}}#$e#Is that weird? I don't get out much, @.${{e9}}
Entries.fall_1: Can you feel the changes in the air? I don't just mean in the temperature. The trees, they are giving off a unique energy.#$e#May this fall be an enchanted one.${{e1}}
Entries.fall_Mon: I aquired the Philosopher's Stone many moons ago. I visited an exceptionally talented alchemist at the advent of his discovery. I was enamoured by the object, and so I desired to obtain it. Nevertheless, an *exchange* was in order...${{e1}}
Entries.fall_Tue: The creatures who slide on the earth, what is their purpose? Where do they come from?${{e3}}#$b#They are known across the ages and cultures but a source for their being has never been found.${{e1}}#$e#Embrace the mysteries of the day, @.${{e1}}
Entries.fall_Wed: Have you seen them? The golems that search for their long-dead creators.#$b#They will wander the mines forever, alone, until they run out of energy.#$e#Have a good day, @. Learn something new.${{e1}}
Entries.fall_Thu: Normal creature or monster? It's hard to tell of the bats that fly in the caves.${{e3}}#$b#Their energy fluctuates with the moon, and they crave the lifeblood of any they can. Beware their haunting gaze.#$e#Seek the energies, @. Enjoy the day.${{e1}}
Entries.fall_Fri: There are creatures who have adapted to look like stone itself in the mines. It it is not through magical means that they did so, rather through sheer will-power.#$b#Sometimes the only energy you need comes from within.${{e1}}#$e#Focus your mind today, @, and be at peace.${{e1}}
Entries.fall_Sat: There are spirits, deep in the mines, who have wandered for eternity. Some of the first souls are still trapped in there.#$b#They don't even resemble humans anymore, so twisted has their ethereal image become. Such a tragedy.${{e2}}#$e#Seek knowledge, seek answers. Have a good one.${{e1}}
Entries.fall_Sun: The mines were once a vast world that was compacted as a result of an ancient war.#$b#Going through the layers is to pass through time itself. Be wary, for it is an unforgiving place.#$b#Those creatures have lost more than their minds.${{e2}}#$e#Be enchanted, @. Be at peace.${{e1}}
Entries.fall_Mon2: The wind is gathering as fall deepens. I have a feeling it is working against me, as my dress keeps lifting and I fear the villagers have seen more than I'd like them too.${{e1}}
Entries.fall_Tue2: Focus on what matters, and all should work out, unless it doesn't. There are no guarantees in life.#$b#In my studies, I have found this to be true, and it is unfortunate. Nothing is guaranteed to always work.#$e#Embrace the mysteries of the day, @.${{e1}}
Entries.fall_Wed2: As the trees enter their slumber, they let loose their leaves and their energy. It is this energy that is useful to me.${{e3}}#$b#Once winter comes, all the energies wane. Fall is the finale.#$e#Have a good day, @. Learn something new.${{e1}}
Entries.fall_Thu2: When all seems lost, it is important to remember that things can still change. For better, or for worse.#$b#It is important not to give up, and to see it through to the end. Easier said than done, sometimes, but I've found it to be true.${{e1}}#$e#Seek the energies, @. Enjoy the day.${{e1}}
Entries.fall_Fri2: I once saw a person try to keep a tree alive all year long, using powerful energies to do so.#$b#It was horrible: the tree itself wept, and begged to be freed. I had to step in and save the tree.${{e2}}#$b#I still have some of its leaves it gave to me as a gift. They are special to me.${{e2}}#$e#Focus your mind today, @, and be at peace.${{e1}}
Entries.fall_Sat2: Have you visited the Shrine of Illusion? I often worship there and manifest my deepest wishes. I find that if I wear my most seductive lingerie and massage my body, the spirits give me what I desire.${{e1}}
Entries.fall_Sun2: You must be having some success on your farm to make it this far, @. How fare your crops?${{e3}}#$b#It is refreshing to see someone push through the difficulty and keep going. Your rewards are ahead of you.${{e1}}#$e#Be enchanted, @. Be at peace.${{e1}}
Entries.fall_Mon4: Long ago, the Shrine of Illusion was in the hands of a group of assassins. They used its powers to change their appearance and make hits.#$b#A very long time ago, indeed.${{e3}}#$e#Have a day to remember, @.${{e1}}
Entries.fall_Tue4: The assassins who used the Shrine of Illusion were almost unstoppable in their time. It took a group of people like myself to stop them.#$b#It was a troubling time. An artifact like that should never be used for such gains.${{e5}}#$e#Embrace the mysteries of the day, @.

Entries.fall_Thu6: I need to focus on my experiments before the energies of fall are gone. Winter is a rough time.#$b#If I can make a breakthrough, I'll ride the excitement till spring.${{e7}}#$e#Seek the energies, @. Enjoy the day.${{e1}}
Entries.fall_Fri6: Many cultures around the world must be aware of the odd energies of fall. So many festivals about monsters are scattered throughout.${{e3}}#$b#It was my favorite time of year as a kid. Now, I must be on my guard.#$e#Focus your mind today, @, and be at peace.${{e1}}
Entries.fall_Sat6: This is the time of harvest, so how has your farm been? Have you been able to get any special crops?${{e1}}#$b#It is my hope that you do. Only through the hands of hard work can the true energy be found.${{e9}}#$e#Seek knowledge, seek answers. Have a good one.${{e1}}
Entries.fall_Sun6: The shadow brutes, have you seen them? Though many are monsters, there is one out there who isn't. Have you met him?#$b#I have known of it for a long time. I hope it remains friendly.${{e3}}#$e#Be enchanted, @. Be at peace.${{e1}}
